title: Last Days Of Dave: Paying Homage To Letterman's Weird And Quirky Legacy
teaser: The off-beat funnyman retires this month after 33 years hosting late-night television. Fresh Air's David Bianculli says that David Letterman's humor "provided a new blueprint for the TV talk show."
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
